texts.es: Doña María Cruz de 55 años de edad, casada y madre de 6 hijos, doña María Cruz desde hace 25 años se dedica  a la venta de frutas  como piñas, papayas, uvas, sandias, melones, y en su mayor parte en el tiempo de cosecha de manzana, doña Cruz como la conocen sus clientes viaja  los días martes, jueves y sábados hacia la central de mayoreo a realizar la compra de sus frutas de primera  calidad y luego viaja a varias zonas de la capital a entregar sus pedidos  en las residenciales donde  sus clientes la esperan para comprar frutas  frescas y hasta la puerta de su casa, también doña Cruz en el tiempo de cosecha de manzana realiza la entrega a varios supermercados  de la ciudad capital, producto que ella compra directamente de las fincas donde se cosecha esta fruta, su deseo es seguir trabajando  para realizar algunas mejoras en su casa, y apoyar a su esposo en su labor de carpintero.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de frutas para agrandar mas su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria Cruz, 55, is married and the mother of 6 children. For 25 years Maria Cruz has sold fruit, such as pineapples, papayas, grapes, watermelons, melons and, for a large part of the harvest, apples. 

As her clients know, Maria Cruz travels on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays to the wholesaler to buy the best quality fruits and then travels to various areas of the capital to make deliveries to the residential areas where her customers wait to buy fresh fruit and to her home. During the apple harvest, Maria Cruz also delivers to various supermarkets in the capital city as she buys directly from the farms where they harvest this fruit.

She wishes to keep working so that she can make improvements to her home and support her husband in his job as a carpenter. 

She is asking for this loan so she can buy fruits to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit to sell.

loans.name: Azalia

texts.en: Azalia is a thirty-two-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese,Uganda. He has been a teacher for ten years and during this time he has been able to pay school fees for his children and also most of his students have become important people in the community which makes him very proud. His business goal is buying land to grow crops so as supplement his salary. Azalia intends to use the loan facility to buy land for crop growing.

loans.use: to buy land for crop growing.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
This is Anita. She previously accessed an 50,000 PHP loan that she used to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her child and in their personal, house hold and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. More items to sell will result for better profit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her child. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Anita hopes to grow her business in the coming years and for her child to finish studying. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is aged 50 and she is charged with the sole responsibility of five children. She has been operating a retail shop and with  the income earned, she has been able to pay school fees for her children. Price fluctuation is the major challenge that hinders her business. Her dream is to educate her children and expand her business into new markets. Sarah wants a loan to buy general merchadise such as soap, sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchadise such as soap ,sugar and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Micheal Angelo

texts.en: Micheal Angelo is a 26-year-old single man, living in Bacolod, Ozamis City: Philippines. Micheal Angelo used his last loan to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. His business is successful, and he's taking a new loan to buy farm chemicals. In the future he hopes to be able to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy farm chemicals

loans.name: Nematjon

texts.en: Nematjon is more than 12 years working with driving. He works with pleasure because he likes his business very much. All his citizens know him as brainy, cute and good-natured. Nematjon knows his business very well and that’s why he has many customers. He has a friendly family. His children are married. His wife works as a nurse and always tries to help to Nematjon. In business there is nobody to help him. He is asking for a loan to buy a mini-bus for developing his business. He awaits your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy a mini-bus for developing his business

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
CANDELARIA
La señora  Candelaria se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas en su domicilio ubicada en una colonia de la aldea de Vista Hermosa como también a la venta de pan durante las mañanas y tardes, ella inicio  su venta hace 8 años con la ayuda de su hermana mayor que le dio el capital para poder comprar maíz, leña, y comal y así mismo dar inicio a su negocio, inicio con la venta de pan  hace 2 años, tiene dos hijos menores de edad que estudian en la escuela de su  aldea, el deseo de ella es seguir adelante esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas leña y maíz  para almacenar en su casa y así mismo poder tener un local propio para su venta   y ser una ayuda económica en su hogar.
texts.en:
Candelaria makes and sells tortillas in her home located in a colony of the town Vista Hermosa, she also sells bread in the mornings and afternoons.

She started selling 8 years ago with the help of her older sister, who gave her the money to be able to buy corn, firewood and a hotplate, and her business was born, she started to sell bread two years ago.

She has two young children who study in the town school and she wishes to succeed.

She is asking for this loan to buy more firewood and corn to store in her home. She aims to be able to have her own store for her sales and to help her household financially.

loans.use: to buy firewood and corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a 38-year-old man living in Masindi, Uganda. For the last 3 years he has been rearing cows and producing milk that he supplies to the town. Inadequate capital to purchase the necessary farm inputs  is his major challenge. Educating his children and expanding the business into new markets is his dream. Charles intends to use the loan facility to buy cows for rearing.

loans.use: to buy cows for rearing.

loans.name: Ma Jelleza

texts.en: Ma. Jelleza is from Cabatuan, Calabayan, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental. She is 37 years old. Ma. Jelleza is married and has four children. Ma. Jelleza used her last loan to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.  Her business has grown and become successful. Now, she's taking a new loan to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business more.

loans.use: to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Garik

texts.en:
Garik is involved in cattle breeding. He runs a farm, where he raises 10 cows and four calves. Garik gathers his income from selling the milk to a local milk factory. Garik would like to increase the number of cows and receive more milk. He also wants to purchase two young pigs and start pig breeding. This will also bring him income from the meat sales. 

Garik lives with his mother and 22-year-old sister. Expanding the farm will allow this young farmer to support his family and have sufficient means to start his own family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for a cow and two young pigs

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 5 filhos 2 dos quais já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para alem dos filhos menores. 	
Tem uma área de produção de culturas diversas para a venda, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos agrícolas (sementes, adubos, fertilizantes, custos de lavoura e outros) para aumentar a sua produção. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua residência e oferecer melhores condições de acomodação a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida e acesso aos financiamentos.
texts.en:
Ana is a widow and mother of 5 children, 2 of whom are of age. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn’t support anyone other than her children who are minors.

She has an area of diverse agricultural cultivations for sale and with this loan she intends to purchase raw materials (seeds, fertilizers, plantation costs and others) to increase her production.

In future she hopes to complete her home and offer her family better living conditions. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: purchase raw materials (seeds, fertilizers, plantation costs and others) to increase her production.

loans.name: Sara Concepcion

texts.es:
La señora Sara de 33 años de edad,  es casada tiene dos hijos que dependen de ella  vive con su esposo quien se dedica junto con ella al negocio de la elaboración de lácteos y cría de cerdos.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo de 15,000.00 lempiras para la compra de concentrado para la cría de credos y también para la compra de leche.
Doña Sara con el apoyo de este préstamo continuara con su proyecto que es la cría y venta de cerdos y su venta de lácteos con las utilidades que les ha generado estos negocios a podido salir adelante en su familia y con su vivienda.
El sueño de Doña Sara es ampliar más su negocio.
San Lorenzo, Honduras  - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Sara, 33, is married with two dependent children. She lives with her husband who works with her in their business making dairy products and raising pigs.

She is requesting a loan of 15,000.00 lempiras to buy food for the pigs and also to buy milk.

Sara, with the help of this loan, will continue her project - raising and selling pigs and selling dairy products. With the money that her businesses have raised she will be able to support her family and her house.

Sara's dream is to develop her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras  - June 2012

loans.use: to buy food to raise pigs and also to buy milk for her business.

loans.name: Benicio Alcides

texts.es:
El señor Benicio de 31 años de edad, vive con su pareja y su hija en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, Honduras, quien se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo al negocio de cría de cerdos para destazo y venta de leña seca para los negocios de golosinas, tortillerías, y comedores, esta actividad la realiza en su carro, viaja de fray Lázaro a Choluteca a vender sus productos.
Don Benicio esta solicitando su préstamo para la compra de leña y algunos cerdos para cría, ya que estos son sus negocios que el realiza para sacar adelante a su familia.
Don Benicio con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende sacar adelante a sus actividades de cría de cerdos y venta de leña.
Don Benicio es un buen cliente un hombre muy trabajador y responsable en sus labores y compromisos.
Entre los sueños de Don Benicio esta tener una buena vivienda para el y su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Benicio is 31 years old. He lives with his spouse and their daughter in the city of San Lorenzo, Honduras. For a long time he has raised pigs for slaughter and sold dry firewood for business that make candies, tortillas and food. He does this in his car, travelling from Fray Lázaro to Choluteca to sell his products. 

Benicio is asking for the loan to buy firewood and some pigs to raise, since these are the businesses he does to get his family ahead.

Benicio, with the support of this loan, intends on getting ahead in his activites raising pigs and selling firewood. He is a good client and a hardworking and responsible man in his work and commitments. Among Benicio's dreams are having a good house for him and his family. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2012

loans.use: to buy firewood and some pigs for his business.

loans.name: Luzvilla

texts.en:
This is Luzvilla, who previously accessed an 8,000 PHP loan that she used to buy things needed for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. She expects a boost in her income as she expands her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan to buy spare parts and for the maintenance of their tricycle unit. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to cover their daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Luzvilla hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of giving her family a good future through all her hard work on her business.She also dreams that her children will finish their education. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies.


* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance of their tricycle.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a twenty-nine-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda.He has been a banker for three years and is very proud of his profession since he has been able to pay school fees for his brother. Personal goal is building a permanent home whereas his business goal is buying land to grow crops. Robert intends to use the money to buy land.

loans.use: to buy land to grow crops

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is a widow with five children. She has been engaged in a sari-sari (variety) store and food business for five years now. She sells food and other goods to the people in her community. She usually earns a certain amount from her sari-sari store and food business.

Alicia is requesting a loan amount of 5000 PHP  to buy more items to sell such as  rice, meat, vegetables and other merchandise.

In the future, Alicia dreams of improving her business to earn a larger amount of income that she will use to cover their daily needs, for reinvestment in the same business and  for savings.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, vegetables and other merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy items like beans, flour, onion, etc.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.pt:
Viúva mãe de 3 filhos, já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negócio de venda de produtos alimentares e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, farinha, arroz, feijão e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e comprar uma viatura para facilitar no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de meios financeiros para expandir o seu negócio para outras zonas.
texts.en:
Ana is a widow and mother of 3 children, all of whom are of age, lives in her own house with her family and doesn’t support anyone else.

She’s a trader and owns her own business selling food stuffs. With this loan she plans to buy products (peanuts, flour, rice, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to complete her home and purchase a vehicle to facilitate her business. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the lack of financial means to expand her business to other areas.

loans.use: buy products (peanuts, flour, rice, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.pt:
Viúva mãe de 5 filhos, 3 destes já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negócio de venda de produtos alimentares e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, amendoim, farinha, arroz, feijão e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e comprar uma viatura para facilitar no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a concorrência e o elevado custo de vida obrigando a procurar outros mercados.
texts.en:
Isabel is a widow and mother of 5 children, 3 of whom are of age, lives in her own house with her family and supports 2 grandchildren who live with her.

She’s a trader and owns her own business selling food stuffs. With this loan she plans to buy products (oil, peanuts, flour, rice, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to complete her home and purchase a vehicle to facilitate her business. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is her competition and the high cost of living which forces her to look for other markets.

loans.use: buy products (oil, peanuts, flour, rice, beans and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Romel Arnoldo

texts.es:
Romel tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero. Desde muy pequeño comenzó a vivir con una tía, hermana de su mamá, debido a la desintegración de su núcleo familiar. Al inicio fue difícil, según comenta; pero se fue acostumbrando. Sus tíos le enseñaron a trabajar en la agricultura y actualmente es empleado en la alcaldía municipal, tiene tres años de estar laborando en ese lugar, siendo su labor mantener limpia la ciudad.

Él desea construir una vivienda; debido a que la casa de su tía esta en malas condiciones. Romel ya inicio la construcción; pero por falta de dinero no ha podido realizar una construcción ordenada. Por esa razón, él esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo para comprar materiales como 500 bloques, cemento, hierro, arena y para pago de mano de obra. Todos estos materiales los compra en una ciudad que esta a dos horas en vehiculo desde su casa.

Lo que él más desea, es tener una casita propia, que por la situación, por la que ha pasado no ha podido concretizar y formar una familia, ver crecer a sus hijos, sin tener que repetir su historia.
texts.en:
Romel is 28 years old and single. When he was very young, he went to live with an aubt, his mother's sister, due to the disintegration of his nuclear family. At first it was hard, but he got used to it. His aunt and uncle taught him to farm and now he is an employee at the town hall. He has been working there for three years, and his job is cleaning the city streets. 

He wants to build a house, since his aunt's house in in porr condition. Romel already started construction, but due to a lack of money he hasn't been able to buld in an orderly way. For that reason, he is asking for a loan from the Fundación Campo to buy materials such 500 blocks, cement, metal rods, and sand, as well as to pay for labor costs. All of these materials he will buy in a city two hours away in car from his house.

What he wants the most is to have his own litttle house, start a family  and see his children grow, without having to repeat his family's history.

loans.use: to buy materials such as 500 blocks, cement, metal rods, and sand, as well as to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Cristo Rey Group

texts.es: El banco comunal  cristo rey esta conformado por los siguientes miembros: Teresa Rosibel, Amparo del socorro, Natividad del socorro, Aracelis del Socorro, Marcia Fatima, Alicia del Socorro, Delbis Maria, Carlos, Petronila, los cuales han demostrado en  el transcurso del tiempo que tiene de trabajar con  leon 2000 que son personas responsable, trabajadoras, con solvencia de pago, Amparo del Socorro es la cordinadora del banco ella tiene por actividada economica compra y venta de cerdos para la elaboracion de platillo tipicos de la localidad,
texts.en: The Cristo Rey communal bank includes the following members: Teresa Rosibel, Amparo del Socorro, Natividad del sScorro, Aracelis del Socorro, Marcia Fatima, Alicia del Socorro, Delbis Maria, Carlos and Petronila. They have demonstrated during the course of time they have worked with Leon 2000 that they are responsible, hard-working and solvent with their payments. Amparo del Socorro is the coordinator of the bank. She buys and sells pigs for preparing typical dishes from the area.

loans.use: purchase pigs for preparing typical local dishes.

loans.name: Rony Randolfo

texts.es:
El joven Rony  de 25 años de edad, vive con su conyugue y su hija en la casa de sus padres ubicada en Choluteca al sur de honduras, dedicándose ya por mas de dos años al negocio de lácteos y cría de cerdos, Rony  es un joven muy trabajador con deseo de salir adelante y superarse ya que su meta para este año es comprar mas cerdos para crecerlos y luego ponerlos a la venta.
Rony solicita el préstamo para comprar cerdos pequeños y luego engordarlos y venderlo, además el compra queso en la lechería en donde trabaja por las tardes y lo revende.
Con el apoyo de este préstamo a su actividad Rony saldrá adelante y mejorara su calidad de vida ya que con las ventas de los cerdos y su utilidad comprara mas cerdos y su negocio ira creciendo.
El sueño de Rony es tener su propia casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Rony is 25 years old. He lives with his spouse and his daughter in his parents' home located in Choluteca, in southern Honduras. For more than two years, he has worked in dairy farming and in raising pigs. Rony is a hardworking young man who wants to get ahead. His goal for this year is to buy more pigs to raise and them sell them.

Rony is asking for this loan to buy small pigs and later fatten them up and sell them. He also buy cheese from the dairy farm he works at in the afternoon and re-sells it.  

With the support of this loan for his activity, Rony will get ahead and improve his quality of life by selling pigs. With the earnings, he will buy more pigs and his business will grow. Rony's dream is to have his own house.
.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2012

loans.use: to buy young pigs for his business.

loans.name: Zarrinakhon

texts.en: Zarrinakhon is a student in 4th year. She studies at the Business and Politic University. So she is a future businesswoman. She has the ability to be busy with business. Her friends love her very much because she is clever and good-natured. She has excellent marks and she wants to pay for her studies but her income doesn’t enough. She tries to get money and she works after classes in a commercial agency. She is asking for a loan to pay for her studies and awaits your help. Your help will make her happy.

loans.use: To paying for studies

loans.name: Lowela

texts.en:
Lowela is 31 years old and lives in Poblacion 1, Clarin. Lowela is married with five children.

Lowela has a general store that sells a variety  of products. She has had this business for six years. Lowela requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.  

Lowela has been a member of PMPC for two years.  In the future, Lowela hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: for buying items like eggs, beans, flour, etc.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en: Tabitha is 37 years old. She operates a retail shop to earn a living. She previously acquired a loan of 80,000 KES which helped her to buy maize flour, sugar, cooking oil and salt. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. She has requested for a loan of 100,000 Kenya shillings to buy ten bales of wheat flour for resale.

loans.use: to buy ten bales of wheat flour.

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
Viúva mãe de dois filhos, um já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe que vive com ela. 	
É negociante e dona do seu negocio de venda de produtos alimentares e  com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, farinha, amendoim, bolachas, biscoitos, feijão, manteiga  e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua casa e comprar uma viatura para facilitar no seu negocio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é trabalhar ainda mais para aumentar o seu rendimento.
texts.en:
Lina is a widow and mother of 2 children, one already of age, lives in her own house with her family and supports her mother who lives with her.

She’s a trader and owns her own business selling food stuffs. With this loan she plans to buy products (rice, flour, peanuts, biscuits, beans, butter and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to complete her home and purchase a vehicle to facilitate her business. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to work even harder to increase her income.

loans.use: buy products (rice, flour, peanuts, biscuits, beans, butter and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Duo Mujeres De Sumpango Group

texts.es: Duo Mujeres de Sumpango,este duo esta integrado por la señora Ericka de 25 años de edad ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de distintas clases desde ya hace varios años,nos comenta que a sido todo una lucha y tambien una oportunidad de Dios que le a dado de poder sostener su negocio, nos comenta que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa ropa para dama y niñas ya que sus clientes le piden nuevos estilos y diseños espera que kiva le pueda ayudar con el credito solicitando para que ella siga con su negocio.
texts.en: Duo Mujeres de Sumpango- half of this duo is Ericka, 25. She has sold different types of clothing for several years. She tells us that running her business has been a struggle as well as an opportunity from God. She remarks that she is asking for this loan to buy women's and children's clothing since her customers are asking for new styles and designs. She hopes that Kiva can help her with the loan she is asking for so she can continue in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Мавчуда замужняя женщина. Имеет двоих детей. Она работает санитаркой в детской санатории.Ее заработная плата очень маленькая но ей помогает ее сын.Он работает плотником и всячески помогает своей матери.Но то что он  зарабатывает уходит только на семейные нужды.Они всегда мечтали купить мебель для своего дома особенно хотят купить две кровати.Мавчуда решила взять кредит для покупки мебели и каждый месяц со своей заработной платы погашать кредит.Она очень рада что с помощью таких организаций  может осуществить свою мечту.
texts.en:
Mavjuda is a married woman. She has two children. She works as a nurse at  a children's hospital. Her salary is very small, but her son helps her. He works as a carpenter and helps his mother in every possible way. But what he earns is only enough to cover the family needs. They have always dreamed of buying furniture for their house and especially want to buy two beds. 

Mavjuda decided to take a loan for the purchase of furniture, and repay the debt every month with her salary. She is very happy that she can realize her dream with the help of this kind organization.

loans.use: for the purchase of furniture

loans.name: Gorretti

texts.en: Gorretti is a twenty-five-year-old hardworking woman with two children living in Fort Portal, Uganda.She has a personal goal of educating her children up to the university level. She sells shoes and she started with capital of seven hundred thousand and now has eight hundred thousand shillings as working capital. She has hardships of high fuel and transportation costs and inadequate capital to buy stock. She has a vision of buying land to grow crops and expanding her business to new markets. Gorreti needs a loan to buy shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Jacklyne

texts.en: Jacklyne is 31 years old. She does tailoring for a living. Previously, she had acquired a loan of 95,000 Kenya shillings from Faulu Kenya and bought a sewing machine and fabric for her business. She has also been able to grow her business because she has been trained in business management. She hopes to expand her business in the future. She has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenya shillings to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia had previously acquired a loan of 50,000 KES which helped her buy fertilizer for her farm. Beside that, she has also been able to diversify her line of business and now sells clothes to generate extra income. Teresia has also been able to change her savings habits since she has been trained on financial management. 

Teresia is requesting a 100,000 KES loan to buy seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Nioula Fode

texts.fr: Madame Nioula Fodé est une femme mariée qui vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le secteur du commerce depuis 10 ans plus particulièrement dans la vente de poissons séchés. Elle est membre dans l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  ou elle sollicite un crédit de 75 000 frs qui est prévu pour  l’achat de poissons séchés pour les besoins de son commerce. Son objectif est de développer d’avantage son activité de commerce, d’accroitre ses bénéfices  pour prendre en charge les frais scolaires de ses enfants et aussi accroitre son épargne.
texts.en:
Nioula Fodé is a married woman living in Senegal. She has been buying and selling dried fish for the past ten years.

She is a member of one of the branches of the U-IMCEC, from whom she is seeking a loan of 75,000 frs in order to buy dried fish for her business.

Her goal is to expand her business and increase her profits so that she can pay for the education of her children and increase her savings.

loans.use: to buy dried fish intended for resale

loans.name: Joao

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos que ainda frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém para além da sua família. 	
É electricista de profissão, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, chapas de zinco, ferro e outros) para reabilitar a sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir a sua residência, aumentar o seu nível de escolaridade e criar gado bovino para garantir o futuro dos filhos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a doença que tem assolado a família nos últimos anos e o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
Joao is married and the father of 5 children who still attend School. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn’t support anyone other than his family.

He’s an electrician by trade and with this loan he plans to buy construction materials (cement, sands, sheets of zinc, iron and others) to rehabilitate his house.

In future he hopes to complete his home, further his education and raise bovine cattle o guarantee the future of his children. To this end he commits to duly paying off his loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the illness that has devastated his family in the last few years and the high cost of living.

loans.use: buy construction material (cement, sands, sheets of zinc, iron and others) to rehabilitate his house.

loans.name: Omar De La Concepcion

texts.es:
Don Omar siguen trabajando mucho para lograr su  meta, construir su casa propia, junto a su esposa e hijos quieren un bienestar mejor, don omar desde hace varios años labora para una casa privada y asi a podido ayudarse con los gastos del hogar, se le ha complicado mucho terminar su casa ya que para don omar es muy dificil reunir de una sola vez el dinero para comprar materiales. pero gracias a Afodenic el podra comprar lo que necesita. Perlines, Zinc, Golosos, Pintura Anticorrosiva, mano de Obra. para darle un acabado al techo.
Muy contento por la confianza que Afodenic le ha brindado quien a travez de fondo Kiva apoyan a personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en:
Omar continues to work toward his goal, to build his own house, along with his wife and children who want to live in better circumstances. For several years, Omar has worked in a private residence, which has added income to pay for his household expenses. It has been a challenge to finish his house because Omar has found it difficult to save enough money at one time to buy materials. Thanks to Afodenic, he will be able to pay for what he needs to finish the roof: beams, zinc, bolts, rust proofing paint, and labor.

He is happy that Afodenic has shown confidence in him by extending a Kiva loan that helps people with limited resources.

loans.use: to pay labor and buy construction materials: zinc, beams, and bolts.

loans.name: Mahsatoy

texts.en:
Mahsatoy is a very hard-working woman. She is a woman with a higher degree who works at school as a teacher. Her income isn’t enough to support her family. Her family is big and needs a lot of money. She has three daughters and one of them wants to study at the university. 

Mahsatoy wants to improve her living standards and with this aim she studied in a course called ‘To get success’ and has got a lot of information about business. She wants to organize her own business sewing national dresses for women. She is asking for a loan to buy a sewing machine. Your kindness will help her to organize a business which maybe will have a successful future.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence rears poultry for a living. She had a previous 20,000 KES loan which she used to buy broilers and chicken feed and also to vaccinate her chickens. Florence has been able to improve her business because she has received financial management training. 

Florence is requesting a 50,000 KES loan to buy more broilers and chicken feed. In the future, she dreams of becoming a supplier of chicken products.

loans.use: to buy broilers and chicken feed and to vaccinate her chickens

loans.name: Pitia

texts.en:
Pitia is a 28 years old and is married with two children ages three and six. Both of her children go to school. She is a businesswoman who lives in Juba. For the past four years, Pitia has run a clothing store and does not have an employee. Her store is her only source of income and her major challenges include high market prices. Pitia learned about Finance Sudan through a loan offer promotion.

Pitia is requesting a 3,500 SDG loan to purchase clothes and other items. In the future, she hopes to open other branches and employee others. She is happy for the loans provided by Finance Sudan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy clothes and materials to sell

loans.name: Duo Nazareth Group

texts.es: Duo Nazareth Este duo esta integrado por la señora Elizabeth ella tiene 50 años de edad,es casada es madre de cinco hijos,ella se dedica a la elavoracion y venta de güipiles a mano, tambien como actividad secundaria vende oyas de peltre en distintos tamaños,esta muy contenta porque dise que con el apoyo que le puedan dar ella seguira incrementando sus ventas, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos y compra de hoyas de peltre.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 50, is a member of the Duo Nazareth Este group.  She is married and the mother of five children.  Elizabeth makes and sells huipilies (typical woven tops).  She also sells pewter jewelry of different sizes.  She is very happy because she says that with this support, she can see her sales increase.  She is requesting a loan to buy basic materials for making the textiles and to buy  the pewter jewelry.

loans.use: to buy the basic materials to buy jewelry to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a waterproof roof for her business.

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru: Рафоат - замужняя женщина,имеющая двоих детей, одного сына и дочь. Муж работает продавцом мужской обуви на рынке, сама работает в поликлинике старшей медсестрой.Кредитуется Рафоат в организации уже третий год, и два предыдущих кредита использовала на свадьбу сына и дочери.Теперь она хочет купить мебель для дома.Её ежемесячная заработная плата очень маленькая и еле хватает на расходы семьи , но учитывая доход мужа и сына она без проблем погашает кредиты, поэтому она благодарна организации за финансирование и доверие.
texts.en:
Rafoat is a married woman, who has two children, one daughter and one son. Her husband works as a salesman for men's shoes at the local market, while she works as a head nurse at a polyclinic. 

Rafoat has had credit with the organization for three years already, and the two previous loans she used for her son's and her daughter's weddings. Currently she would like to buy furniture for her home. Her monthly salary is very small and barely enough for family costs, but considering her husband's and her son's incomes, she can repay the loan without any problems. Therefore she is thankful to the organization for the financing and trust.

loans.use: purchase furniture

loans.name: Abdulatif

texts.ru: Абдулатиф мужчина в возрасте 45 лет.Он кредитуется в нашей организации с 2008 года.Абдулатив женат, имеет троих взрослых детей.Работает поваром по приготовлению национального блюда плов, в центре города.Чтобы закупить масло и рис ему понадобилась сумма которой у него нет в данное время поэтому  он и решил получить очередной кредит. За период кредитования на полученные кредиты он смог отремонтировать свою столовую, чему он благодарен нашей организации.
texts.en:
Abdulatif is a man of 45 years. He has been credited with our organization since 2008. Abdulatif is married and has three grown up children. He works as a cook, preparing the national dish of pilaf, at the center of the city. 

In order to purchase oil and rice, Abdulatif needs an amount of money that he does not currently have, and therefore he decided to get another loan. Over the period he has been credited, he has been able to repair his cafeteria, for which he is grateful to our organization.

loans.use: to purchase rice and oil

loans.name: Teuta

texts.en:
Teuta is a married women from Kosovo who has four children. Her oldest is 22 years old and her youngest is 8 years old. Teuta has a business rearing chickens to sell. She is a hardworking woman who helps her family to improve their life. 

Teuta is requesting a loan to purchase a 200 young chickens to rear and sell at a profit. She hopes to increase her flock and continue to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase 200 chicks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Thoi

texts.en:
Thoi is 48 years old and has four children who are enrolled in primary and secondary school. She grows mushrooms and raises chickens for a living and earns 3,500,000 VND each month. Thoi has participated in the credit program with SEDA since 2007. During the last cycle she borrowed and repaid 7,392,000 VND.

Thoi is requesting a 9,184,000 VND loan to expand her business of growing mushrooms and raising chickens. In the future, she hopes her business will provide profits to cover her children's education fees.

loans.use: to expand her business growing mushrooms and raising chickens

loans.name: Dikir

texts.en: Dikir previously acquired a loan of 15,000 KES from Faulu Kenya which helped him buy goats for resale. He has learnt to save because he has been trained in financial management. He dreams of building a ranch for his livestock in the future. Dikir has requested a loan of 30,000 KES to buy more cows, goats and sheep.

loans.use: to buy more goats, cows and sheep.

loans.name: Ola

texts.en:
Ola is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured in his store.

Ola is a 32-year-old married woman and the mother to two sons and one daughter.

For the past five years, Ola's husband has been selling accessories and stationery, which has been profitable, but the business needs more support to cover the family's needs and the store's costs.

Ola wants to live with her family in better conditions, so she is requesting a $2,000 loan from FATEN to help her husband cover the costs of purchasing more accessories and stationery for the store. This will increase sales and improve the family's income and offer Ola and her family better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase more accessories and stationery for resale

loans.name: Godwin

texts.en: Godwin is a 29-year-old hardworking man living in Kasese, Uganda. He is a banker, and he has been doing this for four years. His personal goal is building a permanent home, and he also has a business plan to buy land and start farming. Godwin wants money to buy land for farming.

loans.use: To buy land for farming.

loans.name: Duo Las Margaritas 3 Group

texts.es:
Dúo las Margaritas de San Bartolo
Este dúo esta conformado por doña María Transita se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas y granos básicos  en su local que se ubica en su casa desde ya hace mas de 11 años doña concha como la conocen sus vecinos y clientes esta solicitando el crédito para surtir   su negocio de frutas y verduras, y granos básicos su propósito es ofrecer siempre verduras  y frutas frescas ya que con el capital del negocio cada dia se necesita más capital para surtir ya que la fruta está muy cara y las verduras también, de igual forma el maíz ya que les vende a las señoras que tienen tortillerías por su zona  ella sale desde muy temprano a la capital a comprar sus productos y llegar por lo menos a las diez de la mañana a su negocio para que sus clientas tengan sus verduras a tiempo para el almuerzo.
texts.en:
Dúo las Margaritas de San Bartolo

For over 11 years, María Transita, a member of this duo, has sold vegetables, fruits, and basic grains from her home. Known to her neighbors and customers as Concha, she is requesting a loan to stock her business with more vegetables, fruits, and basic grains. Her goal is to always offer fresh fruits and vegetables, which requires more business capital daily, since fruits and vegetables are very expensive. Corn, which she sells to local women who make tortillas, is also very expensive. She leaves for the capital very early to buy products and returns to her business by 10 AM so that her customers can have their vegetables in time for breakfast.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Ainuska

texts.ru: Айнуске  24 года, имеет годовалого сына и ждет второго ребенка. Айнуска в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении 3 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с замужества. Благодаря упорному труду Айнуски и ее семьи,  в хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  8 коров  с телятами, 15 овец, 2 головы лошади. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнуска обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота для отправки на летнее пастбище.  Доходы от кредита Айнуска будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса.
texts.en:
Ainuska is 24 years old, has a year-old son and is expecting her second child. In search of a main source of income for her family, Ainuska has been engaged in livestock breeding for a period of 3 years, after having started this business together with her husband. Thanks to Ainuska and her family's persistent work, the farm currently has 8 cows with offspring, 15 sheep and 2 horses. 

With an aim to further develop her business, Ainuska turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of additional livestock for sending to summer pasture. Ainuska plans to invest the income from the loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Rosa is 39 years old, married, has five children and lives in Lapasan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

She used her last loan to buy supplies for her coconut farm. Her business has since expanded and become successful. Now she would like a new loan to pay for services to increase her crop's yield. She's excited by the possibility of further expanding her business.

loans.use: to pay for services to increase her crop yield

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George runs a motorcycle transport business to earn a living. 

He previously took out a loan of 20,000 KES, which helped him service his motorcycle. He has also been able to improve his business because he has been trained in business management. 

He dreams of operating a taxi business in the future. He needs a loan of 50,000 KES to buy another motorcycle.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Secheme Mélanie

texts.fr: Agée de 42 ans, Secheme Mélanie est mariée et mère de deux jumeaux scolarisés dans une école de la place. Couturière de profession, elle associe à sa profession la vente de pagnes, de chaussures, de bijoux et des savons liquide depuis des années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Ses clients sont composés des fonctionnaires et surtout des enseignants. Soucieuse de renforcer son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire la demande de ses clients et de maximiser son profit, elle a fait recours au financement de Finadev. Ce financement lui permettra de participer aux dépenses de la famille et d'assurer un soin médical adéquat pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Secheme Mélanie is 42 years old, married, and mother of twins who both attend a local school.

She is a seamstress by trade, and has also been selling African cloths, shoes, jewels, and liquid soaps on the side for years now. She stocks up at one of the local markets. Her clients are mainly civil servants and teachers.

She sought financing from Finadev to strengthen her business in order to satisfy the demand of her customers and maximize her profits. This financing will allow her to help cover her family's expenses and ensure that her children receive proper medical care.

loans.use: to buy 1 dozen reels of thread, 5 pieces of African cloth, 12 shoes of various qualities, and 1 dozen jewels

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
El señor Dolores de 60 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su familia en su casa ubicada en San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, El se dedica desde hace ya varios años al transporte y tiene dos taxis con sus respectivos números y también se dedica a la renta de apartamentos.
Don Dolores esta solicitando el préstamo para reparar uno de sus taxis y para comprar llantas para sus unidades, con el préstamo Don Dolores mejorara sus ingresos porque una unidad la tiene dañada y desea repararla para mejorar sus ingresos.
El Sueño de Don Dolores es mejorar sus unidades de transporte y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2012
texts.en:
Dolores, 60, lives with his wife and family in his house in San Lorenzo, in the southern part of Honduras.  He has worked in transportation for several years now and has two taxis, each with its own registration number.  He also rents apartments.

Dolores is requesting the loan to repair one of his taxis and buy tires for his vehicles.  With the loan Dolores will improve his income because one of his units is damaged and he wants to repair it to improve his income.

Dolores's dream is to improve his vehicles and have a better quality of life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras, May 2012

loans.use: to repair one of his taxis and to buy tires.

loans.name: Mario Felipe

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 29 años, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona, lamentablemente por diversas circunstancias desde hace varios años decidió separarse de su pareja, Mario tiene un pequeño hijo de aquella relación, él dedica todo su trabajo y esfuerzos  para sacar adelante a su pequeño; por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil; en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus vecinos y amigos, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su madre, desde hace varios años, Mario se dedica al rubro de la construcción laborando como maestro de obras, el trabaja diariamente un aproximado de 8 horas, Mario cree que su negocio marcha bien ya que sus cliente siempre lo recomiendan por sus bueno trabajos y por su trato amable y respetuoso.
Mario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la reparación del motor de un maquina trompito que utiliza para poder realizar su labor; de esta manera Mario contará con su herramienta de trabajo en buenas condiciones y  podrá atender a mas cantidad de clientes, con cuyas ganancias en un futuro espera utilizar para adquirir una camioneta para trasladar sus herramientas de trabajo.
texts.en:
Mario is a 29 year old man. He lives with his parents in the city of Ica in the Parcona district. Unfortunately a few years ago, he separated from his partner for different reasons. Mario has a son from this relationship. He dedicates all of his work and efforts in order to help his child get ahead. Due to the need to work and pay his expenses, he could not complete a professional career course. He would have liked to study civil engineering. In his free time, he likes to play football with his neighbors and friends. Sometimes, he cooks delicious arroz con pollo (chicken with rice) to share with his family. 
Through his own initiative and with his mother’s help, a few years ago, Mario started working in construction as a foreman. He works every day for approximately eight hours. Mario believes that his business is going well since his customers always recommend him for his good work and for his friendly and respectful treatment. 
Mario is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the support given, he will be able to make repairs to a spin machine’s motor that he uses for his work. Mario will have his work tools in good condition and will be able to reach a larger quantity of customers. With these earnings, in the future, he hopes to have a truck to transport his work tools.

loans.use: cover the repair expenses for his spin machine.

loans.name: Aziz

texts.ru: Азиз мужчина в возрасте 46  молодой человек, женат имеет троих детей , двое из которых студенты. Сам Азиз работает инженером на фабрике, его ежемесячный доход еле хватает на жизнь. Его жена работает учительницей, а у преподавателей тоже оплата маленькая, поэтому они никак не могут накопить денег на ремонт квартиры.Чтобы сделать ремонт нужна большая сумма а у них такой суммы нет. Узнав от друга о кредитах, Азиз решил обратится к нам за кредитом. Он рад , что сможет отремонтировать свою квартиру и постепенно погашать полученный кредит с доходов семьи.
texts.en:
Aziz is a man of 46 years of age, married, and has three children, out of which two are students. Aziz works as an engineer at a factory, and his monthly income barely is enough for daily life. His wife works as a teacher, and a teacher's salary is also small. Therefore they can never save up money for repair of their apartment. 

In order to do repairs they need a large sum of money, and they don't have this amount. After having learned about the loans from a friend, Aziz decided to turn to us for a loan. He is happy that he can restore his apartment and stepwise repay the loan received with the family's incomes.

loans.use: to repair his home

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth is 32 years old from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with a daughter who is three years old. 

Maribeth has been in the scrap-buying business for three years now. In addition, she owns a sari-sari (general) store. She is asking for a loan to buy scrap from suppliers and merchandise for her store like rice, snack foods, soft drinks, seasonings and canned goods. 

Maribeth is dreaming of an increased income so she can better provide for her child's needs, such as diapers and milk. She would like to save for her daughter's future, so she can send her to school someday.

loans.use: to buy scrap from suppliers and merchandise for her store like rice, snack foods, soft drinks, seasonings and canned goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar and salt for resale.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
This is Angelina, 42. She is a resident of Silang, Cavite City, Philippines. She is married to Salvador, a mason, and she is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses and support her children’s schooling. 

Angelina operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that retails groceries, toiletries and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, 5 pesos worth of cooking oil or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 800 Philippine pesos (Php) in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 22,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products needed in her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Angelina hopes to grow her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week, and this is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional stock of supplies and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Duo Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
Dúo Virgen de Fátima
El grupo está conformado por la señora Ana Paulina quien necesita otro crédito para la compra de ingredientes ( ajonjolí, aceite, tomates) para la preparación de tamales , la compra de leña y maíz ella se dedica a su negocio desde hace 6 años tiene dos hijos menores de edad que estudian en la escuela local el sueño de ella es seguir creciendo para estar ayudando siempre  en su hogar ya que es el único sustento para sus hijos, nos cuenta que gracias a Dios y a los credito que le han otorgado a podido poco a poco salir adelante,espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
Dúo Virgen de Fátima

Ana Paulina, a member of this group, needs another loan to buy ingredients (sesame seeds, oil, and tomatoes) to make tamales and to buy wood and corn. She has been doing this work for 6 years and has two children who attend the local school. Her dream is to keep growing so that she will always sustain her household, since she is the sole provider. She says that thanks to God and the loan granted to her, she has slowly been able to get ahead. She hopes that her loan request will be fulfilled.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tamales (sesame seeds, oil, and tomatoes).

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Camaná con su amada esposa y sus 2 hijos, el siempre ha sido una persona muy alegre, entusiasta y trabajador, que junto con su pareja han unido sus esfuerzos para salir adelante; lamentablemente por la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de Veterinaria; en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programa educativos y noticieros en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pato para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia y gracias al apoyo de su familia, José se dedica a la agricultura, el cuenta con una pequeña parcela donde siembra frejoles, desde tempranas horas de la mañana José se dedica a realizar diversas labores de campo, el puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas diaria y se encuentra muy a gusto con el trabajo que realiza ya que siempre le ha gustado el campo.
José se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos y el mantenimiento de su cultivo, comprando el abono necesario; de esta manera podrá mantener su cultivo en buenas condiciones y así cuando su cosecha termine podrá obtener buenas ganancias, con las cuales en un futuro no muy lejano espera poder cultivar diversos sembríos y adquirir ganado, para con ello espera poder asegurar el futuro y bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
José, 43, lives in the city of Camaná with his beloved wife and 2 children. He has always been a happy, enthusiastic, and hardworking person that has worked side-by-side with his wife to get ahead. Sadly, he was not able to complete a degree because he had to work to meet expenses, but he would have enjoyed studying veterinary medicine. In his free time, he watches educational TV programs and the news and sometimes cooks a delicious Rice with Duck for his family.

On his own initiative and with his family's support, José farms a smallholding where he plants beans. He performs various farming tasks from early in the morning and can work about 10 hours a day. He likes his work since he has always loved the countryside.

José is grateful for Kiva loans because they allow him to cover the expenses and maintenance of his plantings. Buying needed manure allows him to maintain his plantings and, when the harvest is complete, receive a good profit. In the not-so-distant future, he hopes to be able to diversify his plantings and purchase livestock with this profit so that he can ensure a bright future for and the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure.
